title: Information Literacy Education Program for Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and college-level information retrieval experience
context.additional_context: Credit-bearing course focusing on cultivating information analysis/evaluation skills required for scientific research and education for pre-service/professional teachers

learning_goals: They can systematically search scientific academic resources and evaluate their scholarly credibility.
Writing and presenting reports that critically analyze bias and reliability of information sources.
Completing a lesson design project utilizing information literacy in science education settings.

resources: Access to Science Domain Academic Database

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
